segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the adult carefully drying her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is a waterfall of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge, drenching everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron will be soaked soon if she doesn't turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the tipping stool, hand inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excitement is palpable, even in lines.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the wet floor adds real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks inviting and dry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark reminder of indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for them all in this unsuspecting scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
